comment.author: 59437650@N07
comment._content: was at namirembe last week. No sign of it

comment.author: 26227071@N03
comment._content: This window  (and the others in adjacent images) may not have been installed, or may have been replaced. Hard to know which other Cathedral it could be as St Paul's Cathedral Namirembe was the first cathedral and could well have been known in the Colonial Office as Uganda Cathedral; however George V died in 1936 and the present Namirembe Cathedral was finished in 1919, so this may have been a plan that was never fulfilled. Unfortunately the official history is currently off the web.
